name: Rival Nation Wars
description: Rival Nation Wars is a 1 or 2 player real time strategy game in which you research technologies, build buildings, and manage your workforce, in order to purchase the weapons you'll need to defeat your enemy before it defeats you. Rival Nation Wars has a 1-player campaign mode spanning 18 scenarios, 2-player simultaneous head to head action, four tutorial campaigns, high score board, and a full in game manual.
